00044 $page_title = 'Loan Report by Class Report';
00045 $reportView = false;

00047     $reportView = true;

00049 
00050 if (!$reportView) {
00051 ?>
00052     <!-- filter -->
00053     <fieldset style="margin-bottom: 3px;">

00059             <div class="divRowContent">
00060             <?php
00061             $class_options[] = array('0', __('0 Classes'));

00063             $class_options[] = array('2', __('2 Classes'));
00064             $class_options[] = array('2X', __('2X Classes (Islamic Related)'));
00065             $class_options[] = array('3', __('3 Classes'));
00066             $class_options[] = array('4', __('4 Classes'));

00080             <?php
00081             $coll_type_q = $dbs->query('SELECT coll_type_id, coll_type_name FROM mst_coll_type');
00082             $coll_type_options = array();
00083             $coll_type_options[] = array('0', __('ALL'));
00084             while ($coll_type_d = $coll_type_q->fetch_row()) {
00085                 $coll_type_options[] = array($coll_type_d[0], $coll_type_d[1]);
00086             }
00087             echo simbio_form_element::selectList('collType', $coll_type_options);

00094             <?php
00095             $current_year = date('Y');
00096             $year_options = array();
00097             for ($y = $current_year; $y > 1999; $y--) {
00098                 $year_options[] = array($y, $y);
00099             }
00100             echo simbio_form_element::selectList('year', $year_options, $current_year-1);

00113 <?php
00114 } else {
00115     ob_start();
00116     // months array
00117     $months['01'] = __('Jan');
00118     $months['02'] = __('Feb');
00119     $months['03'] = __('Mar');
00120     $months['04'] = __('Apr');
00121     $months['05'] = __('May');
00122     $months['06'] = __('Jun');
00123     $months['07'] = __('Jul');
00124     $months['08'] = __('Aug');
00125     $months['09'] = __('Sep');
00126     $months['10'] = __('Oct');
00127     $months['11'] = __('Nov');
00128     $months['12'] = __('Dec');
00129 
00130     // table start
00131     $row_class = 'alterCellPrinted';
00132     $output = '<table align="center" class="border" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0">';
00133 
00134     // header
00135     $output .= '<tr>';
00136     $output .= '<td class="dataListHeaderPrinted">'.__('Classification').'</td>';
00137     foreach ($months as $month) {
00138         $output .= '<td class="dataListHeaderPrinted">'.$month.'</td>';
00139     }
00140     $output .= '</tr>';
00141 
00142     // class
00143     $class_num = isset($_GET['class'])?trim($_GET['class']):'0';
00144     // year
00145     $selected_year = date('Y')-1;
00146     if (isset($_GET['year']) AND !empty($_GET['year'])) {
00147         $selected_year = (integer)$_GET['year'];
00148     }
00149     // collection type
00150     $coll_type = null;
00151     if (isset($_GET['collType'])) {
00152         $coll_type = (integer)$_GET['collType'];
00153         $coll_type_q = $dbs->query('SELECT coll_type_name FROM mst_coll_type
00154             WHERE coll_type_id='.$coll_type);
00155         $coll_type_d = $coll_type_q->fetch_row();
00156         $coll_type_name = $coll_type_d[0];
00157     }
00158 
00159     $row_class = ($class_num%2 == 0)?'alterCellPrinted':'alterCellPrinted2';
00160     if ($class_num == 'NONDECIMAL') {
00161         $output .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong style="font-size: 1.5em;">NON DECIMAL Classification</strong></td>';
00162     } else {
00163         $output .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong style="font-size: 1.5em;">'.$class_num.'00</strong></td>';
00164 
00165         // count loan each month
00166         foreach ($months as $month_num => $month) {
00167             $loan_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biblio AS b
00168                 LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id
00169                 LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00170                 WHERE TRIM(classification) LIKE '$class_num%' AND l.loan_date LIKE '$selected_year-$month_num-%'".( !empty($coll_type)?" AND i.coll_type_id=$coll_type":'' ));
00171             $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00172             if ($loan_d[0] > 0) {
00173                 $output .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong style="font-size: 1.5em;">'.$loan_d[0].'</strong></td>';
00174             } else {
00175                 $output .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'"><span style="color: #ff0000;">'.$loan_d[0].'</span></td>';
00176             }
00177         }
00178 
00179         $output .= '</tr>';
00180 
00181         $class_num2 = 0;
00182         // 2nd subclasses
00183         while ($class_num2 < 10) {
00184             $row_class = ($row_class == 'alterCellPrinted')?'alterCellPrinted2':'alterCellPrinted';
00185 
00186             $output .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;'.$class_num.$class_num2.'0</strong></td>';
00187             // count loan each month
00188             foreach ($months as $month_num => $month) {
00189                 $loan_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biblio AS b
00190                     LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id
00191                     LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00192                     WHERE TRIM(classification) LIKE '$class_num"."$class_num2%' AND l.loan_date LIKE '$selected_year-$month_num-%'".( !empty($coll_type)?" AND i.coll_type_id=$coll_type":'' ));
00193                 $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00194                 if ($loan_d[0] > 0) {
00195                     $output .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong style="font-size: 1.5em;">'.$loan_d[0].'</strong></td>';
00196                 } else {
00197                     $output .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'"><span style="color: #ff0000;">'.$loan_d[0].'</span></td>';
00198                 }
00199             }
00200 
00201             $output .= '</tr>';
00202             $class_num2++;
00203         }
00204     }
00205     $output .= '</table>';
00206 
00207     // print out
00208     echo '<div class="printPageInfo">Loan Recap By Class <strong>'.$class_num.'</strong> for year <strong>'.$selected_year.'</strong>'.( isset($coll_type_name)?'<div>'.$coll_type_name.'</div>':'' ).' <a class="printReport" onclick="window.print()" href="#">['.__('Print Current Page').']</a></div>'."\n";
00209     echo $output;
00210 
00211     $content = ob_get_clean();
00212     // include the page template
00213     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/printed_page_tpl.php';
00214 }
